titleStmt.title: A scheme of the rates and duties granted to His Majesty upon marriages, births and burials and upon batchelors and widowers, for the term of five years, from May 1. 1695. Useful to the commissioners, assessors, collectors and receivers of the said duties, and to all persons subject or liable to the payment of any the said rates or duties.
titleStmt.author: King, Gregory, 1648-1712.

titleStmt.title: A scheme of the rates and duties granted to His Majesty upon marriages, births and burials and upon batchelors and widowers, for the term of five years, from May 1. 1695. Useful to the commissioners, assessors, collectors and receivers of the said duties, and to all persons subject or liable to the payment of any the said rates or duties.
titleStmt.author: King, Gregory, 1648-1712.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Charles Bill, and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb deceased, printers to the Kings most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Collected and digested, by Gr. King Esq; Lanc. Her.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
